channel.title: [HELP]Anti-lag
channel.description: I have a problem with anti-lag. I set up a time and it works well...it write that server is reastarting and it saves all games. But after it only writes "The game was sucsesfylly saved for all players" ...may may times and it doesnt run server again. How i can fix it?

item.title: [HELP]Anti-lag
item.dc:creator: @AsianStyle AsianStyle
item.description:
@AsianStyle wrote:

ok, but can u tell what auto-restarter i can use? i tried 2 more but they dont work

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]Anti-lag
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

The lagginess of the server is because one thread is doing ALL the updating of each player, each NPC, etc. You couldn’t fix it without trashing the current design of ALL current servers. So yeah.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]Anti-lag
item.dc:creator: @AsianStyle AsianStyle
item.description:
